attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No one actually enjoys it and it costs a fortune. It is no more than a commercial enterprise to exploit the poor into spending money they do not have on goods made by politician and prison labour in countries that we should not even be trading with. It is no longer a celebration of the birth of the Messiah but an orgy of gluttony, greed and mammon. God long ago abandoned christmas and so should Her Majesty's Government.
